Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
If :proc_sel_prop.n_ide is not null or nvl(:proc_sel_prop.Vlr_Prop,0)<>0 then
 IF :CONTROL.BUSQUEDA1 ='N' THEN 
 ENABLE('PROC_SEL.TIPO_CONT',1);
 END IF;
 IF :CONTROL.BUSQUEDA1 ='S' THEN 
 GO_BLOCK ('PROC_SEL_PROP_REQ');
 EXECUTE_QUERY (ALL_RECORDS);
 IF :PROC_SEL_PROP_REQ.COD_REQ IS NULL THEN
 LLENA_REQ;
 END IF;
 
 ELSE 
 LLENA_REQ;
 :CONTROL.BUSQUEDA1 :='S';
 END IF; 
GO_ITEM('PROC_SEL_PROP_REQ.CUMPLE');
 else
 messagebox('Debe Proporcionar un Proponente por lo menos con Valor');
end if;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
:CONTROL.BUSQUEDA:='S';
:CONTROL.BUSQUEDA1:='S';
GO_BLOCK ('PROC_SEL');
CLEAR_BLOCK (NO_VALIDATE);
EXECUTE_QUERY (ALL_RECORDS);
ENABLE('PROC_SEL.TIPO_CONT',1);
IF :PROC_SEL.ESTADO = 'D' THEN
 MESSAGEBOX('ESTE PROCESO HA SIDO DECLARADO DESIERTO');
 LIMPIAR;
END IF;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText: GO_ITEM ('PROC_SEL.FECHA');

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 RES NUMBER:=1;
BEGIN
 RES := PREGUNTAR('VA A DECLARAR DESIERTO EL PROCESO. ESTA SEGURO');
 IF RES = 1 THEN
 if :control.grupo_chequeo is not null then
 :PROC_SEL.ESTADO := 'D';
 GRABAR;
 end if;
 END IF;
END;

Trigger.Name: KEY-NEXT-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
/*IF TO_CHAR(:PROC_SEL.FECHA,'YYYY')<>TO_CHAR (SYSDATE,'YYYY') THEN
 MESSAGEBOX ('EL AÑO NO PUEDE SER DIFERENTE AL CORRIENTE');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
END IF;*/
NEXT_ITEM;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-LIST-CHANGED
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :PROC_SEL.TIPO_CDP='D' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY ('PROC_SEL.N_VIG',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY ('PROC_SEL.PER_VIG',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY ('PROC_SEL.PER_DIS',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY ('PROC_SEL.DIS',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 :PROC_SEL.N_VIG := '';
 :PROC_SEL.PER_VIG := '';
 :PROC_SEL.DIS_FUT := '';
 :PROC_SEL.PER_DIS_FUT := '';
 GO_ITEM ('PROC_SEL.PER_DIS');
ELSIF :PROC_SEL.TIPO_CDP='V' THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY ('PROC_SEL.N_VIG',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY ('PROC_SEL.PER_VIG',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY ('PROC_SEL.PER_DIS',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY ('PROC_SEL.DIS',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 /* :PROC_SEL.PER_DIS := '';
 :PROC_SEL.DIS := '';*/
 GO_ITEM ('PROC_SEL.PER_VIG');
ELSE
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY ('PROC_SEL.N_VIG',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY ('PROC_SEL.PER_VIG',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY ('PROC_SEL.PER_DIS',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY ('PROC_SEL.DIS',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 :PROC_SEL.N_VIG := '';
 :PROC_SEL.PER_VIG := '';
-- :PROC_SEL.PER_DIS := '';
-- :PROC_SEL.DIS := '';
 :PROC_SEL.DIS_FUT := '';
 :PROC_SEL.PER_DIS_FUT := '';
END IF;

Trigger.Name: POST-CHANGE
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :PROC_SEL.COD_CAT IS NOT NULL THEN
 BEGIN 
 SELECT DESCRIPCION
 INTO :PROC_SEL.DESC_CATEGORIA
 FROM CATEGORIA_PPTO
 WHERE C_EMP=:GLOBAL.EMPRESA AND ANO=TO_CHAR(:PROC_SEL.FECHA,'YYYY')
 AND COD_CAT=:PROC_SEL.COD_CAT; 
 EXCEPTION 
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 MESSAGEBOX ('CATEGORIA NO ENCONTRADA');
 :PROC_SEL.DESC_CATEGORIA:='NO ENCONTRADA';
 WHEN TOO_MANY_ROWS THEN 
 MESSAGEBOX ('CATEGORIA DUPLICADA'); 
 :PROC_SEL.DESC_CATEGORIA:='CATEGORIA DUPLICADA';
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 MESSAGEBOX ('ERROR EN LA BASE DE DATOS');
 :PROC_SEL.DESC_CATEGORIA:='ERROR EN LA BASE DE DATOS';
 END;
END IF;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
BEGIN
 SELECT X.DESCRIPCION
 INTO :PROC_SEL.DESC_TIPO_CONT
 FROM TIPO_CONTROL X, REQ_CATEGORIA Y
 WHERE Y.C_EMP=:GLOBAL.EMPRESA
 AND Y.COD_CAT=:PROC_SEL.COD_CAT
 AND X.TIPO_CONT=:PROC_SEL.TIPO_CONT
 AND X.C_EMP=Y.C_EMP
 AND X.TIPO_CONT=Y.TIPO_CONT
 AND X.TIPO_PROC=Y.TIPO_PROC;
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN NULL;
 WHEN TOO_MANY_ROWS THEN NULL;
 WHEN OTHERS THEN NULL; 
END;
 
:Global.Tramite :=Null;
:Global.Doc :=Null; 
BEGIN 
 SELECT COD_TRAMITE, COD_DOCUMENTO, COD_TRAMITE, COD_DOCUMENTO
 INTO :CONTROL.GRUPO_CHEQUEO, :CONTROL.GRUPO_DOC,:Global.Tramite,:Global.Doc 
 FROM TIPO_CONTROL
 WHERE C_EMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA 
 AND TIPO_CONT = :PROC_SEL.TIPO_CONT
 AND TIPO_PROC = 'S'; 
EXCEPTION WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN Null;
END;
IF :PROC_SEL.TIPO_CONT IS NOT NULL THEN
 DECLARE
 /********************************************************************************
 *** ESTAS VARIABLES SE UTILIZAN MAS ABAJO PARA VALIDAR EL MONTO DEL CONTRATO ***
 *** CON EL RANGO PARA EL TIPO DE CONTROL. ***
 *********************************************************************************/
 VALOR_INI NUMBER(38,4);
 VALOR_FIN NUMBER(38,4);
 SALMIN VAR.SAL_MIN%TYPE;
 FECHA VARCHAR2(4);
 BEGIN
 /**********************************************************************
 *** VALIDAR QUE EL MONTO DEL CONTRATO SE ENCUENTRE DENTRO DEL RANGO
 *** PARA EL TIPO DE CONTROL.
 ***********************************************************************/
 IF :PROC_SEL.COD_CAT IS NOT NULL AND :PROC_SEL.MONTO IS NOT NULL THEN
 SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY')
 INTO FECHA
 FROM DUAL;
 SELECT VLR_INI, VLR_FIN
 INTO VALOR_INI, VALOR_FIN
 FROM REQ_CATEGORIA
 WHERE C_EMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA
 AND COD_CAT = :PROC_SEL.COD_CAT
 AND TIPO_CONT = :PROC_SEL.TIPO_CONT
 AND TIPO_PROC = 'S';
 SELECT SAL_MIN
 INTO SALMIN
 FROM VAR
 WHERE C_EMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA AND ANO = FECHA;
 VALOR_INI := VALOR_INI * SALMIN;
 VALOR_FIN := VALOR_FIN * SALMIN;
 IF :PROC_SEL.MONTO <= VALOR_INI OR :PROC_SEL.MONTO >VALOR_FIN THEN
 MESSAGEBOX('El monto de este contrato esta por fuera del rango para el tipo de control');
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END;
END IF;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :PROC_SEL.MONTO > :PROC_SEL.SALDO_DISP THEN
 MESSAGEBOX ('ERROR. EL VALOR DEL MONTO EXCEDE EL VALOR DEL SALDO DE LA DISPONIBILIDAD'); 
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
END IF;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
if :control.grupo_chequeo is not null then
 IF :CONTROL.BUSQUEDA ='N' THEN 
 ENABLE('PROC_SEL.TIPO_CONT',1);
 END IF;
 IF :CONTROL.BUSQUEDA ='S' THEN 
 GO_BLOCK ('PROC_SEL_REQ');
 EXECUTE_QUERY (ALL_RECORDS);
 IF :PROC_SEL_REQ.COD_REQ IS NULL THEN
 VALIDAR;
 END IF;
 ELSE 
 VALIDAR;
 :CONTROL.BUSQUEDA :='S';
 END IF; 
 GO_ITEM('PROC_SEL_REQ.COD_REQ');
end if;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
if :control.grupo_chequeo is not null then
GO_BLOCK('PROC_SEL_PROP');
end if;

Relation.Name: PROC_SEL_PROC_SEL_REQ
Relation.JoinCondition:
PROC_SEL_REQ.C_EMP = PROC_SEL.C_EMP AND
PROC_SEL_REQ.PER = PROC_SEL.PER AND
PROC_SEL_REQ.SEQ = PROC_SEL.SEQ AND
PROC_SEL_REQ.TIPO_CONT = PROC_SEL.TIPO_CONT

Relation.Name: PROC_SEL_PROC_SEL_PROP
Relation.JoinCondition:
PROC_SEL_PROP.C_EMP = PROC_SEL.C_EMP AND
PROC_SEL_PROP.PER = PROC_SEL.PER AND
PROC_SEL_PROP.SEQ = PROC_SEL.SEQ AND
PROC_SEL_PROP.TIPO_CONT = PROC_SEL.TIPO_CONT

Trigger.Name: ON-POPULATE-DETAILS
Trigger.TriggerText:
--
-- Begin default relation declare section
--
DECLARE
 recstat VARCHAR2(20) := :System.record_status; 
 startitm VARCHAR2(61) := :System.cursor_item; 
 rel_id Relation;
--
-- End default relation declare section
--
--
-- Begin default relation program section
--
BEGIN
 IF ( recstat = 'NEW' or recstat = 'INSERT' ) THEN 
 RETURN;
 END IF;
 --
 -- Begin PROC_SEL_REQ detail program section
 --
 IF ( (:PROC_SEL.C_EMP is not null) or (:PROC_SEL.PER is not null) or (:PROC_SEL.SEQ is not null) or (:PROC_SEL.TIPO_CONT is not null) ) THEN 
 rel_id := Find_Relation('PROC_SEL.PROC_SEL_PROC_SEL_REQ'); 
 Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'PROC_SEL_REQ'); 
 END IF;
 --
 -- End PROC_SEL_REQ detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin PROC_SEL_PROP detail program section
 --
 IF ( (:PROC_SEL.C_EMP is not null) or (:PROC_SEL.PER is not null) or (:PROC_SEL.SEQ is not null) or (:PROC_SEL.TIPO_CONT is not null) ) THEN 
 rel_id := Find_Relation('PROC_SEL.PROC_SEL_PROC_SEL_PROP'); 
 Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'PROC_SEL_PROP'); 
 END IF;
 --
 -- End PROC_SEL_PROP detail program section
 --

 IF ( :System.cursor_item <> startitm ) THEN 
 Go_Item(startitm); 
 Check_Package_Failure; 
 END IF;
END;
--
-- End default relation program section
--

Trigger.Name: ON-CHECK-DELETE-MASTER
Trigger.TriggerText:
--
-- Begin default relation declare section
--
DECLARE
 Dummy_Define CHAR(1);
 --
 -- Begin PROC_SEL_REQ detail declare section
 --
 CURSOR PROC_SEL_REQ_cur IS 
 SELECT 1 FROM proc_sel_req p 
 WHERE p.C_EMP = :PROC_SEL.C_EMP and p.PER = :PROC_SEL.PER and p.SEQ = :PROC_SEL.SEQ and p.TIPO_CONT = :PROC_SEL.TIPO_CONT;
 --
 -- End PROC_SEL_REQ detail declare section
 --
 --
 -- Begin PROC_SEL_PROP detail declare section
 --
 CURSOR PROC_SEL_PROP_cur IS 
 SELECT 1 FROM proc_sel_prop p 
 WHERE p.C_EMP = :PROC_SEL.C_EMP and p.PER = :PROC_SEL.PER and p.SEQ = :PROC_SEL.SEQ and p.TIPO_CONT = :PROC_SEL.TIPO_CONT;
 --
 -- End PROC_SEL_PROP detail declare section
 --
--
-- End default relation declare section
--
--
-- Begin default relation program section
--
BEGIN
 --
 -- Begin PROC_SEL_REQ detail program section
 --
 OPEN PROC_SEL_REQ_cur; 
 FETCH PROC_SEL_REQ_cur INTO Dummy_Define; 
 IF ( PROC_SEL_REQ_cur%found ) THEN 
 Message('No puede borrar registro maestro cuando existen registros detalle coincidentes.'); 
 CLOSE PROC_SEL_REQ_cur; 
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure; 
 END IF;
 CLOSE PROC_SEL_REQ_cur;
 --
 -- End PROC_SEL_REQ detail program section
 --
 --
 -- Begin PROC_SEL_PROP detail program section
 --
 OPEN PROC_SEL_PROP_cur; 
 FETCH PROC_SEL_PROP_cur INTO Dummy_Define; 
 IF ( PROC_SEL_PROP_cur%found ) THEN 
 Message('No puede borrar registro maestro cuando existen registros detalle coincidentes.'); 
 CLOSE PROC_SEL_PROP_cur; 
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure; 
 END IF;
 CLOSE PROC_SEL_PROP_cur;
 --
 -- End PROC_SEL_PROP detail program section
 --
END;
--
-- End default relation program section
--

Trigger.Name: PRE-INSERT
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
 CONSEC NUMBER(8);
 CERR NUMBER(4);
 MERR VARCHAR2(500);
 TIP_CONSEC VARCHAR2(1);
Begin 
 :PROC_SEL.PER:=TO_CHAR(:PROC_SEL.FECHA,'YYYYMM');
 NUMERACION.CSC(:GLOBAL.EMPRESA, :PROC_SEL.PER,:PROC_SEL.TIPO_CONT,CONSEC,CErr, MErr); 
 IF CERR != 0 THEN
 MSGERR (CERR, MERR);
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END IF; 
 :PROC_SEL.C_EMP := :GLOBAL.EMPRESA; 
 :PROC_SEL.ESTADO := 'P'; 
 :PROC_SEL.SEQ := CONSEC; 
 :PROC_SEL.TIPO_PROC := 'S';

 
End;

Trigger.Name: POST-QUERY
Trigger.TriggerText:
BEGIN
 SELECT DESCRIPCION
 INTO :PROC_SEL.DESC_TIPO_CONT
 FROM TIPO_CONTROL 
 WHERE C_EMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA AND
 TIPO_CONT = :PROC_SEL.TIPO_CONT AND
 TIPO_PROC = :PROC_SEL.TIPO_PROC;
 EXCEPTION 
 WHEN OTHERS THEN NULL; 
END;

BEGIN
 Select nom
 INTO :PROC_SEL.NOM_AREA
 from area_trab
 where c_emp = :global.empresa AND
 C_ARE = :PROC_SEL.AREA; 
 EXCEPTION 
 WHEN OTHERS THEN NULL; 
END;
BEGIN 
 SELECT COD_TRAMITE, COD_DOCUMENTO
 INTO :CONTROL.GRUPO_CHEQUEO, :CONTROL.GRUPO_DOC
 FROM TIPO_CONTROL
 WHERE C_EMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA 
 AND TIPO_CONT = :PROC_SEL.TIPO_CONT
 AND TIPO_PROC = 'S'; 
 EXCEPTION WHEN OTHERS THEN Null; 
END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
POST;
GO_ITEM ('PROC_SEL.OBJETO');

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText: GO_BLOCK ('PROC_SEL');

Trigger.Name: PRE-INSERT
Trigger.TriggerText:
/*
:PROC_SEL_REQ.C_EMP :=:GLOBAL.EMPRESA;
:PROC_SEL_REQ.PER :=:PROC_SEL.PER;
:PROC_SEL_REQ.SEQ :=:PROC_SEL.SEQ;
:PROC_SEL_REQ.TIPO_CONT :=:PROC_SEL.TIPO_CONT;
*/
:PROC_SEL_REQ.COD_GREQORI:=:GLOBAL.TRAMITE;
:PROC_SEL_REQ.COD_REQORI :=:GLOBAL.DOC;
:PROC_SEL_REQ.TIPO_PROC :=:PROC_SEL.TIPO_PROC;

:PROC_SEL_REQ.COD_CAT :=:PROC_SEL.COD_CAT;

Trigger.Name: POST-QUERY
Trigger.TriggerText:
BEGIN
 SELECT NOM
 INTO :PROC_SEL_REQ.DESC_REQ
 FROM GREQ_DET
 WHERE C_EMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA
 AND COD_GREQ = :CONTROL.GRUPO_CHEQUEO 
 AND COD_REQ = :PROC_SEL_REQ.COD_REQ 
 AND ESTADO = 'A';
 EXCEPTION WHEN OTHERS THEN NULL;
END;
BEGIN
 SELECT ESTADO, OPCIONAL
 INTO :PROC_SEL_REQ.ESTADO, :PROC_SEL_REQ.OPCIONAL
 FROM GREQ_DET
 WHERE C_EMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA and 
 COD_GREQ = :PROC_SEL_REQ.COD_GREQ and
 COD_REQ = :PROC_SEL_REQ.COD_REQ;
 EXCEPTION WHEN OTHERS THEN :PROC_SEL_REQ.ESTADO := 'I';
END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText: GO_ITEM ('PROC_SEL.OBJETO');

Relation.Name: PROC_SEL_PROP_PROC_SEL_PROP_
Relation.JoinCondition:
PROC_SEL_PROP_REQ.C_EMP = PROC_SEL_PROP.C_EMP AND
PROC_SEL_PROP_REQ.PER = PROC_SEL_PROP.PER AND
PROC_SEL_PROP_REQ.SEQ = PROC_SEL_PROP.SEQ AND
PROC_SEL_PROP_REQ.N_IDE = PROC_SEL_PROP.N_IDE

Trigger.Name: ON-POPULATE-DETAILS
Trigger.TriggerText:
--
-- Begin default relation declare section
--
DECLARE
 recstat VARCHAR2(20) := :System.record_status; 
 startitm VARCHAR2(61) := :System.cursor_item; 
 rel_id Relation;
--
-- End default relation declare section
--
--
-- Begin default relation program section
--
BEGIN
 IF ( recstat = 'NEW' or recstat = 'INSERT' ) THEN 
 RETURN;
 END IF;
 --
 -- Begin PROC_SEL_PROP_REQ detail program section
 --
 IF ( (:PROC_SEL_PROP.C_EMP is not null) or (:PROC_SEL_PROP.PER is not null) or (:PROC_SEL_PROP.SEQ is not null) or (:PROC_SEL_PROP.N_IDE is not null) ) THEN 
 rel_id := Find_Relation('PROC_SEL_PROP.PROC_SEL_PROP_PROC_SEL_PROP_'); 
 Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'PROC_SEL_PROP_REQ'); 
 END IF;
 --
 -- End PROC_SEL_PROP_REQ detail program section
 --

 IF ( :System.cursor_item <> startitm ) THEN 
 Go_Item(startitm); 
 Check_Package_Failure; 
 END IF;
END;
--
-- End default relation program section
--

Trigger.Name: ON-CHECK-DELETE-MASTER
Trigger.TriggerText:
--
-- Begin default relation declare section
--
DECLARE
 Dummy_Define CHAR(1);
 --
 -- Begin PROC_SEL_PROP_REQ detail declare section
 --
 CURSOR PROC_SEL_PROP_REQ_cur IS 
 SELECT 1 FROM proc_sel_prop_req p 
 WHERE p.C_EMP = :PROC_SEL_PROP.C_EMP and p.PER = :PROC_SEL_PROP.PER and p.SEQ = :PROC_SEL_PROP.SEQ and p.N_IDE = :PROC_SEL_PROP.N_IDE;
 --
 -- End PROC_SEL_PROP_REQ detail declare section
 --
--
-- End default relation declare section
--
--
-- Begin default relation program section
--
BEGIN
 --
 -- Begin PROC_SEL_PROP_REQ detail program section
 --
 OPEN PROC_SEL_PROP_REQ_cur; 
 FETCH PROC_SEL_PROP_REQ_cur INTO Dummy_Define; 
 IF ( PROC_SEL_PROP_REQ_cur%found ) THEN 
 Message('No puede borrar registro maestro cuando existen registros detalle coincidentes.'); 
 CLOSE PROC_SEL_PROP_REQ_cur; 
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure; 
 END IF;
 CLOSE PROC_SEL_PROP_REQ_cur;
 --
 -- End PROC_SEL_PROP_REQ detail program section
 --
END;
--
-- End default relation program section
--

Trigger.Name: PRE-INSERT
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :PROC_SEL_PROP.N_IDE IS NOT NULL AND :PROC_SEL_PROP.VLR_PROP IS NULL THEN
 MESSAGEBOX('DEBE DIGITAR EL VALOR DE LA PROPUESTA DEL PROPONENTE '||
 :PROC_SEL_PROP.NOM);
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
END IF;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
Commit;
GO_ITEM ('PROC_SEL_PROP.N_IDE');
--GO_BLOCK('PROC_SEL_PROP');

Trigger.Name: PRE-INSERT
Trigger.TriggerText:
:PROC_SEL_PROP_REQ.C_EMP :=:GLOBAL.EMPRESA;
:PROC_SEL_PROP_REQ.SEQ :=:PROC_SEL.SEQ;
:PROC_SEL_PROP_REQ.TIPO_CONT:=:PROC_SEL.TIPO_CONT;
:PROC_SEL_PROP_REQ.TIPO_PROC:=:PROC_SEL.TIPO_PROC;
:PROC_SEL_PROP_REQ.PER :=:PROC_SEL.PER;
:PROC_SEL_PROP_REQ.COD_CAT :=:PROC_SEL.COD_CAT;

Trigger.Name: POST-QUERY
Trigger.TriggerText:
BEGIN
 SELECT NOM
 INTO :PROC_SEL_PROP_REQ.NOM_REQ
 FROM GREQ_DET
 WHERE C_EMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA
 AND COD_GREQ = :CONTROL.GRUPO_DOC 
 AND COD_REQ = :PROC_SEL_PROP_REQ.COD_REQ 
 AND ESTADO = 'A';
 EXCEPTION WHEN OTHERS THEN NULL;
END;
BEGIN
 select nom
 INTO :PROC_SEL_PROP_REQ.NOMBRE
 from nits
 where c_emp = :global.empresa AND
 n_ide = :PROC_SEL_PROP_REQ.N_ide;
 EXCEPTION WHEN OTHERS THEN NULL;
END;
BEGIN
 select estado, OPCIONAL
 into :PROC_SEL_PROP_REQ.ESTADO, :PROC_SEL_PROP_REQ.OPCIONAL
 from GREQ_DET
 where C_EMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA and 
 COD_GREQ = :PROC_SEL_PROP_REQ.cod_greq and
 COD_REQ = :proc_sel_PROP_req.cod_req;
 exception when others then :proc_sel_PROP_REQ.estado := 'I';
End;

ProgramUnit.Name: LLENA_REQ
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE LLENA_REQ IS
 grup_doc tipo_control.cod_documento%type;
 grup_tra tipo_control.cod_tramite%type; 
 wdoc greq_enc.cod_greq%type;
 
 cursor req is
 select nvl(cod_req,' ') cod_req, nvl(orden,0) orden, nom
 from greq_det
 where c_emp = :global.empresa
 and cod_greq= :control.grupo_doc
 and estado = 'A';
BEGIN 
 go_block('proc_sel_prop_req'); 
 
 for a in req loop 
 :proc_sel_prop_req.c_emp := :global.empresa;
 :proc_sel_prop_req.n_ide := :proc_sel_prop.n_ide;
 :proc_sel_prop_req.nombre := :proc_sel_prop.nom;
 :proc_sel_prop_req.per := :proc_sel.per;
 :proc_sel_prop_req.seq := :proc_sel.seq;
 :proc_sel_prop_req.cod_cat := :proc_sel.cod_cat;
 :proc_sel_prop_req.tipo_cont := :proc_sel.tipo_cont;
 :proc_sel_prop_req.cod_greq := :control.grupo_doc;
 :proc_sel_prop_req.cod_req := a.cod_req;
 :proc_sel_prop_req.orden := a.orden;
 :proc_sel_prop_req.nom_req := a.nom;
 Create_record;
 end loop;
 delete_record;

 
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: SALIR
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE salir IS
res number;
BEGIN
 Res := 0;
 If (:System.form_status = 'CHANGED') Then
 Res := Preguntar ('La Forma Tiene Datos Sin Grabar. Desea Almacenarlos Ahora?');
 End If;
 If (Res = 1) Then
 Grabar;
 End If;
 Exit_form(no_validate);
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: LIMPIAR
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE limpiar IS
res number;
BEGIN 
 Res := 1;
 If (:System.form_status = 'CHANGED' Or :System.form_status = 'NEW') Then
 Res := Preguntar ('La Forma Tiene Datos Sin Grabar. Desea Blanquear?');
 End If;
 If (Res = 1) Then
 ENABLE('PROC_SEL.TIPO_CONT',0);
 Clear_Form (No_Validate); 
 Inicio; 
 End If;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: INICIO
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE INICIO IS
PPTOBASE NUMBER(16,2);
SALARIOMIN NUMBER(16,2);
PPTO NUMBER(16,2); 
ANO_TRABAJO VARCHAR2(4);

BEGIN 
 
 Execute_Trigger('INIT'); 
 --:PROC_SEL.TIPO_CDP := 'D';
 
 Go_item('proc_Sel.fecha');
 IF NOT VERIFICAMOD('PRESOF') THEN
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('Proc_sel.tipo_cdp',Visible, Property_False);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('Proc_sel.per_dis',Visible, Property_False);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('Proc_sel.dis',Visible, Property_False);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('Proc_sel.per_vig',Visible, Property_False);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('Proc_sel.n_vig',Visible, Property_False);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('Proc_sel.saldo_disp',Visible, Property_False); 
 END IF;
 
 Begin
 :PROC_SEL.FECHA:=SYSDATE;
 ANO_TRABAJO:=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY');
 -- SE BUSCA EL PRESUPUESTO ANUAL APROBADO DE EGRESOS
 PPTOBASE := PRESOFAPROBADO (:GLOBAL.EMPRESA,ANO_TRABAJO,'E');
 -- Ubico el salario mínimo
 begin
 Select sal_min
 Into salariomin
 From var
 Where c_emp = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA
 and ano = ANO_TRABAJO;
 Exception When No_Data_Found Then
 salariomin := 1;
 end;
 ppto := pptobase / salariomin;
 End;
 -- Busco la categoría del presupuesto
 Begin
 select cod_cat,DESCRIPCION
 into :PROC_SEL.COD_CAT,:PROC_SEL.DESC_CATEGORIA
 from categoria_ppto
 where c_emp = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA
 AND ANO = ANO_TRABAJO
 And ppto >= valor_ppto_ini
 And ppto <= valor_ppto_fin;
 Exception When no_data_found Then
 :PROC_SEL.COD_cat := 'NN';
 :PROC_SEL.DESC_CATEGORIA:='CATEGORIA NO DEFINIDA PARA AÑO EN CURSO';
 End;
 
 :CONTROL.BUSQUEDA:='N';
 :CONTROL.BUSQUEDA1:='N';

 /* :PROC_SEL.DETALLES_CAT:='SE SELECCIONO ESTA CATEGORIA PORQUE EL PPTO DEL AÑO: '||ANO_TRABAJO
 ||' ES DE : $ '||TO_CHAR(PPTOBASE)||' QUE EQUIVALEN A: '||TO_CHAR(ROUND (PPTO,0))||' SALARIOS MINIMOS';*/
 -- go_block('proc_sel');
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: IMPRIMIR
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE IMPRIMIR IS
 list_id ParamList;
BEGIN
 null;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: GRABAR
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE grabar IS
 res number;

BEGIN
 IF :PROC_SEL.FECHA IS NULL OR :PROC_SEL.AREA IS NULL OR
 :PROC_SEL.TIPO_CONT IS NULL OR :GRUPO_CHEQUEO IS NULL OR :PROC_SEL.OBJETO IS NULL
 THEN
 MESSAGEBOX('DEBE PROPORCIONAR COMO MINIMO LA FECHA, CENTRO DE COSTO, AREA, TIPO CONTRATO, GRUPO DE CHEQUEO Y OBJETO DEL CONTRATO');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END IF;
 
 IF TO_CHAR(:PROC_SEL.F_CREA_CONT,'YYYY')<>TO_CHAR(:PROC_SEL.FECHA,'YYYY') THEN
 MESSAGEBOX ('ERROR AL GRABAR. AÑO DE FECHA DE GRABACION DIFERENTE A AÑO FECHA DE CREACIÓN');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END IF;
 
 Commit_Form; 
 IF FORM_SUCCESS THEN
 MESSAGEBOX('PROCESO DE SELECCION GENERADO # '||:PROC_SEL.SEQ||' del periodo '||:PROC_SEL.PER);
 LIMPIAR;
 END IF;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: BORRAR
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE borrar IS
res number;
BEGIN
 Res := Preguntar('Desea Eliminar Este Registro?');
 If Res = 1 Then
 GO_BLOCK(:TOOLBAR.NOMBRE_BLOQUE); 
 Delete_record; 
 End If;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: CHECK_PACKAGE_FAILURE
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
Procedure Check_Package_Failure IS
BEGIN
 IF NOT ( Form_Success ) THEN
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: QUERY_MASTER_DETAILS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE Query_Master_Details(rel_id Relation,detail VARCHAR2) IS
 oldmsg VARCHAR2(2); -- Old Message Level Setting
 reldef VARCHAR2(5); -- Relation Deferred Setting
BEGIN
 --
 -- Initialize Local Variable(s)
 --
 reldef := Get_Relation_Property(rel_id, DEFERRED_COORDINATION);
 oldmsg := :System.Message_Level;
 --
 -- If NOT Deferred, Goto detail and execute the query.
 --
 IF reldef = 'FALSE' THEN
 Go_Block(detail);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 :System.Message_Level := '10';
 Execute_Query;
 :System.Message_Level := oldmsg;
 ELSE
 --
 -- Relation is deferred, mark the detail block as un-coordinated
 --
 Set_Block_Property(detail, COORDINATION_STATUS, NON_COORDINATED);
 END IF;

EXCEPTION
 WHEN Form_Trigger_Failure THEN
 :System.Message_Level := oldmsg;
 RAISE;
END Query_Master_Details;

ProgramUnit.Name: CLEAR_ALL_MASTER_DETAILS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE Clear_All_Master_Details IS
 mastblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Initial Master Block Causing Coord
 coordop VARCHAR2(30); -- Operation Causing the Coord
 trigblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Cur Block On-Clear-Details Fires On
 startitm VARCHAR2(61); -- Item in which cursor started
 frmstat VARCHAR2(15); -- Form Status
 curblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Block
 currel VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Relation
 curdtl VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Detail Block

 FUNCTION First_Changed_Block_Below(Master VARCHAR2)
 RETURN VARCHAR2 IS
 curblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Block
 currel VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Relation
 retblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Return Block
 BEGIN
 --
 -- Initialize Local Vars
 --
 curblk := Master;
 currel := Get_Block_Property(curblk, FIRST_MASTER_RELATION);
 --
 -- While there exists another relation for this block
 --
 WHILE currel IS NOT NULL LOOP
 --
 -- Get the name of the detail block
 --
 curblk := Get_Relation_Property(currel, DETAIL_NAME);
 --
 -- If this block has changes, return its name
 --
 IF ( Get_Block_Property(curblk, STATUS) = 'CHANGED' ) THEN
 RETURN curblk;
 ELSE
 --
 -- No changes, recursively look for changed blocks below
 --
 retblk := First_Changed_Block_Below(curblk);
 --
 -- If some block below is changed, return its name
 --
 IF retblk IS NOT NULL THEN
 RETURN retblk;
 ELSE
 --
 -- Consider the next relation
 --
 currel := Get_Relation_Property(currel, NEXT_MASTER_RELATION);
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END LOOP;

 --
 -- No changed blocks were found
 --
 RETURN NULL;
 END First_Changed_Block_Below;

BEGIN
 --
 -- Init Local Vars
 --
 mastblk := :System.Master_Block;
 coordop := :System.Coordination_Operation;
 trigblk := :System.Trigger_Block;
 startitm := :System.Cursor_Item;
 frmstat := :System.Form_Status;

 --
 -- If the coordination operation is anything but CLEAR_RECORD or
 -- SYNCHRONIZE_BLOCKS, then continue checking.
 --
 IF coordop NOT IN ('CLEAR_RECORD', 'SYNCHRONIZE_BLOCKS') THEN
 --
 -- If we're processing the driving master block...
 --
 IF mastblk = trigblk THEN
 --
 -- If something in the form is changed, find the
 -- first changed block below the master
 --
 IF frmstat = 'CHANGED' THEN
 curblk := First_Changed_Block_Below(mastblk);
 --
 -- If we find a changed block below, go there
 -- and Ask to commit the changes.
 --
 IF curblk IS NOT NULL THEN
 Go_Block(curblk);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 Clear_Block(ASK_COMMIT);
 --
 -- If user cancels commit dialog, raise error
 --
 IF NOT ( :System.Form_Status = 'QUERY'
 OR :System.Block_Status = 'NEW' ) THEN
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF;

 --
 -- Clear all the detail blocks for this master without
 -- any further asking to commit.
 --
 currel := Get_Block_Property(trigblk, FIRST_MASTER_RELATION);
 WHILE currel IS NOT NULL LOOP
 curdtl := Get_Relation_Property(currel, DETAIL_NAME);
 IF Get_Block_Property(curdtl, STATUS) <> 'NEW' THEN
 Go_Block(curdtl);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 Clear_Block(NO_VALIDATE);
 IF :System.Block_Status <> 'NEW' THEN
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 currel := Get_Relation_Property(currel, NEXT_MASTER_RELATION);
 END LOOP;

 --
 -- Put cursor back where it started
 --
 IF :System.Cursor_Item <> startitm THEN
 Go_Item(startitm);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 END IF;

EXCEPTION
 WHEN Form_Trigger_Failure THEN
 IF :System.Cursor_Item <> startitm THEN
 Go_Item(startitm);
 END IF;
 RAISE;

END Clear_All_Master_Details;

ProgramUnit.Name: VALIDAR
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE VALIDAR IS
 GRUP_DOC TIPO_CONTROL.COD_DOCUMENTO%TYPE;
 GRUP_TRA GREQ_ENC.COD_GREQ%TYPE;
 WGRUP GREQ_ENC.COD_GREQ%TYPE;
 WREQ GREQ_ENC.COD_GREQ%TYPE;
 SECUENCIA GREQ_DET.ORDEN%TYPE;
/* CURSOR PARA ENCONTRAR LOS REQUERIMIENTOS DEL GRUPO SELECCIONADO*/
 CURSOR REQ is
 SELECT COD_GREQ,COD_REQ, NVL(ORDEN,0) ORDEN,NOM
 FROM GREQ_DET
 WHERE C_EMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA
 AND COD_GREQ = :CONTROL.GRUPO_CHEQUEO 
 AND ESTADO = 'A';
BEGIN
 
 -- SE LIMPIA EL BLOQUE PARA LLENARLO NUEVAMENTE
 GO_BLOCK ('PROC_SEL_REQ');
 CLEAR_BLOCK(NO_VALIDATE);
 

 FIRST_RECORD;
 
 FOR VC0 IN REQ LOOP
 /*
 IF VC0.COD_REQ IS NOT NULL THEN
 CREATE_RECORD;
 END IF;
 */
 :PROC_SEL_REQ.C_EMP := :GLOBAL.EMPRESA;
 :PROC_SEL_REQ.PER := :PROC_SEL.PER;
 :PROC_SEL_REQ.SEQ := :PROC_SEL.SEQ;
 :PROC_SEL_REQ.COD_CAT := :PROC_SEL.COD_CAT;
 :PROC_SEL_REQ.COD_GREQ := VC0.COD_GREQ;
 :PROC_SEL_REQ.COD_REQ := VC0.COD_REQ;
 :PROC_SEL_REQ.ORDEN := VC0.ORDEN;
 :PROC_SEL_REQ.DESC_REQ := VC0.NOM;
 CREATE_RECORD;
 END LOOP;
 SECUENCIA := :PROC_SEL_REQ.ORDEN;

/* Se identifica el grupo de requisitos para el Tipo de contrato */
 BEGIN
 SELECT COD_GREQ
 INTO WREQ
 FROM TIPO_CONTROL_CONTR
 WHERE C_EMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA
 AND TIPO_CONT = :PROC_SEL.TIPO_CONT
 AND TIPO_PROC = :PROC_SEL.TIPO_PROC
 AND C_TIP = :PROC_SEL.C_TIP;
 EXCEPTION 
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN 
 WREQ := NULL;
 END;
 
 IF WREQ IS NOT NULL THEN 
 FOR VC0 IN REQ LOOP
 IF VC0.COD_REQ IS NOT NULL THEN 
 CREATE_RECORD;
 END IF; 
 SECUENCIA := SECUENCIA + 1;
 :PROC_SEL_REQ.C_EMP := :GLOBAL.EMPRESA;
 :PROC_SEL_REQ.PER := :PROC_SEL.PER;
 :PROC_SEL_REQ.COD_CAT := :PROC_SEL.COD_CAT; 
 :PROC_SEL_REQ.TIPO_CONT := :PROC_SEL.TIPO_CONT;
 :PROC_SEL_REQ.COD_GREQ := WREQ;
 :PROC_SEL_REQ.SEQ := :PROC_SEL.SEQ;
 :PROC_SEL_REQ.COD_REQ := VC0.COD_REQ;
 :PROC_SEL_REQ.ORDEN := SECUENCIA;
 :PROC_SEL_REQ.DESC_REQ := VC0.NOM;
 END LOOP;
 secuencia := :proc_sel_req.orden;
 END IF;
 FIRST_RECORD;
 
 
END;

RecordGroup.Name: CCOSTO
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
SELECT C_COS, NOM 
FROM CCOST 
WHERE C_EMP =:GLOBAL.EMPRESA
 AND CLA_CC ='D'

RecordGroup.Name: PER_DIS
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
SELECT DISTINCT PERIODO PERIODO
FROM DISPPTAL_ENC 
WHERE C_EMP=:GLOBAL.EMPRESA
AND ESTADO='A'
AND SUBSTR(PERIODO,1,4)=TO_CHAR(:PROC_SEL.FECHA,'YYYY')
ORDER BY PERIODO DESC

RecordGroup.Name: DISP
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
SELECT DIS,PRESOFSALDOCDP(:GLOBAL.EMPRESA,DIS,:PROC_SEL.PER_DIS) SALDO
FROM DISPPTAL_ENC
WHERE C_EMP=:GLOBAL.EMPRESA
AND PERIODO=:PROC_SEL.PER_DIS
AND ESTADO='A'
AND PRESOFSALDOCDP(:GLOBAL.EMPRESA,DIS,:PROC_SEL.PER_DIS) >0
ORDER BY DIS

RecordGroup.Name: TIPO_CONTROL
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
SELECT X.TIPO_CONT, X.NOM_TIPO_CONTROL,X.TIPO_PROC,X. DESCRIPCION,
 Y.VLR_INI, Y.VLR_FIN
FROM TIPO_CONTROL X, REQ_CATEGORIA Y
WHERE Y.C_EMP=:GLOBAL.EMPRESA
 AND Y.COD_CAT=:PROC_SEL.COD_CAT
 AND X.C_EMP=Y.C_EMP
 AND X.TIPO_CONT=Y.TIPO_CONT
 AND X.TIPO_PROC=Y.TIPO_PROC
 AND X.TIPO_PROC='S'

RecordGroup.Name: TIPO_CONTROL2
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
SELECT X.TIPO_CONT, X.NOM_TIPO_CONTROL, X.TIPO_PROC, X.DESCRIPCION,
 Y.VLR_INI, Y.VLR_FIN
FROM TIPO_CONTROL X, REQ_CATEGORIA Y
WHERE Y.C_EMP = :GLOBAL.EMPRESA
 AND Y.COD_CAT = :PROC_SEL.COD_CAT
 AND X.C_EMP = Y.C_EMP
 AND X.TIPO_CONT = Y.TIPO_CONT
 AND X.TIPO_PROC = Y.TIPO_PROC
 AND X.TIPO_PROC = 'S'

RecordGroup.Name: PER
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
SELECT PER FROM PERIODO
WHERE C_EMP=:GLOBAL.EMPRESA
AND SUBSTR(PER,5,7) NOT IN ('13','14','15')
AND ACT='S'
ORDER BY PER DESC

RecordGroup.Name: SEQUENCIA
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
SELECT SEQ
FROM PROC_SEL
WHERE C_EMP=:GLOBAL.EMPRESA
 AND PER=:CONTROL.PER
 AND TIPO_CONT=:CONTROL.TIPO_CONT
 AND ESTADO='P'
 AND ((DIS IS NOT NULL AND PER_DIS IS NOT NULL)
 OR (N_VIG IS NOT NULL AND PER_VIG IS NOT NULL))
ORDER BY SEQ

RecordGroup.Name: VIG_FUT
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
SELECT ALL DISP_VIGENCIAS_ENC.N_VIG, DISP_VIGENCIAS_ENC.PER_VIG, DISP_VIGENCIAS_ENC.DIS, 
DISP_VIGENCIAS_ENC.PERIODO, DISP_VIGENCIAS_ENC.TOTAL
FROM DISP_VIGENCIAS_ENC

Trigger.Name: INIT
Trigger.TriggerText:
Declare
 Empresa Parametros.Emp%Type;
 LogoPath Varchar2 (200); 
Begin
 --
 -- Maximiza la ventana inicial
 --
 :SYSTEM.MESSAGE_LEVEL:=20;
 Set_Window_Property ('WINDOW0', Window_State, Maximize);
 
 --
 -- Selecciona el nombre de la empresa
 --
 --:GLOBAL.EMPRESA:= '01';
 :TOOLBAR.C_EMP := :GLOBAL.EMPRESA;
 Begin
 Select Emp, logo Into Empresa, :toolbar.nombre_logo
 From Parametros
 Where C_Emp = :TOOLBAR.c_emp;
 Exception
 When no_data_found Then
 --
 -- Si la empresa no está definida se sale de la forma
 --
 MessageBox ('Empresa '||:TOOLBAR.c_emp||' no está definida.');
 Exit_Form (No_Validate); 
 End;
 --
 -- Despliega el nombre de la empresa en una o dos líneas
 -- dependiendo de la longitud del nombre
 --
 :Toolbar.Nombre_Empresa1 := Empresa;
 :Toolbar.Nombre_Empresa2 := Empresa;
 If (NVL(Length (:Toolbar.Nombre_Empresa1), 0) > 30) Then
 Set_Item_Property ('Toolbar.Nombre_Empresa2', Displayed, Property_True);
 Set_Item_Property ('Toolbar.Nombre_Empresa1', Displayed, Property_False);
 Else
 Set_Item_Property ('Toolbar.Nombre_Empresa2', Displayed, property_False);
 Set_Item_Property ('Toolbar.Nombre_Empresa1', Displayed, property_True);
 End If;
 --
 -- Despliega el logo de la empresa
 --
 execute_trigger('lee_imagenes');

 --
 -- Llama al procedimiento de inicio particular de cada forma
 --
 Default_Value ('***', 'global.audsid'); 
 Begin
 Select machine Into Empresa
 From v$usr_sess
 Where audsid = :Global.audsid;
 Exception
 When others Then
 EXIT_FORM (NO_VALIDATE);
 --Null;
 End;
End;

Trigger.Name: ON-CLEAR-DETAILS
Trigger.TriggerText:
--
-- Begin default relation program section
--
BEGIN
 Clear_All_Master_Details;
END;
--
-- End default relation program section
--
